title: Verge Apartments in Rajagiriya
details:
Located just 1.5 km away from the city limits of Colombo, located in Rjajagiriya, Verge strives to be an expression of simplicity that captures the very essence of contemporary living.

Pursuing a promise to give you just what you need, the complex entails facilities that highlight an effective understanding of just what your modern day living standards require, building the ideal home for everyone that’s ready to take on the world and the rapid metropolis, but also holds close a surfacing desire for the calm serenity of the suburbs.
